items.name: static func == (SRError, SRError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

items.name: static func != (SRError, SRError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the value by feeding them into the specified hasher.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A string that indicates the localized description of the error.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: A string that indicates the Core Foundation error domain.

items.name: var errorCode: Int
items.desc: An integer value for an error.

items.name: var code: Code
items.desc: A code that indicates the cause of the error.

items.name: enum SRError.Code
items.desc: The kinds of problems that stop a recording or a fetch.

items.name: static var promptDeclined: SRError.Code
items.desc: Occurs when the user cancels the sensor approval workflow.

items.name: static var dataInaccessible: SRError.Code
items.desc: Occurs when the app can't access the sensor's data.

items.name: static var fetchRequestInvalid: SRError.Code
items.desc: Occurs when the app misconfigures a fetch request.

items.name: static var invalidEntitlement: SRError.Code
items.desc: Occurs when the app lacks the required entitlement.

items.name: static var noAuthorization: SRError.Code
items.desc: Occurs when the user declines sensor access in the Settings app.
